mapper.sql:
FROM woc.vehicle v LEFT JOIN woc.person p ON v.ownerId = p.id LEFT JOIN portal.department d ON v.ownerCompanyId = d.department_id where 0=0
and plateNo like concat('%',#{condition.plateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
mapper.select: select count(*) from vehicle where plateNo=#{plateNo}
